articles.title: Much of South under flood threat as rain drenches region
articles.description: Flood watches and warnings covered much of the South on Friday as torrential rains were flooding roads and highways and filling rivers and streams close to their banks.

articles.author: By JAKE SEINER AP Sports Writer
articles.title: AP source: RP Harris to join with Nats after losing Game 7
articles.description: Relief pitcher Will Harris is joining the Washington Nationals after they beat him in Game 7 of the World Series against the Houston Astros.
articles.content:
Relief pitcher Will Harris is joining the Washington Nationals after they beat him in Game 7 of the World Series against the Houston Astros.

articles.title: Hawaii man killed in motorcycle collision with ambulance
articles.description: HANAPEPE, Hawaii (AP) — A Hawaii man died in an early morning crash when his motorcycle collided with an ambulance that was responding to a call, authorities said.
articles.content:
HANAPEPE, Hawaii (AP) A Hawaii man died in an early morning crash when his motorcycle collided with an ambulance that was responding to a call, authorities said.

articles.description: ANCHORAGE, Alaska (AP) — The cost of operating some businesses at the Port of Alaska is expected to increase following new tariffs on commodities that took effect with the onset of the new year.

articles.title: Alaska bans rockfish from commercial and personal fishing
articles.description: SITKA, Alaska (AP) — The Alaska Department of Fish and Game has announced a full-year closure of both commercial and personal fishing of two varieties of rockfish.
articles.content:
SITKA, Alaska (AP) The Alaska Department of Fish and Game has announced a full-year closure of both commercial and personal fishing of two varieties of rockfish.
